description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d77cq","text":"Third generation long-read sequencing requires high quality DNA. Here, we developed a protocol for the extraction of high quality, high molecular weight(HMW) DNA from plants. This protocol was developed and optimized forStreptocarpus, a plant possessing high amounts of secondary metabolic compounds, such as polysaccharides. The extracted DNA was used for PacBio Sequel II continuous long reads (CLR) and Oxford Nanopore Technologies PromethION sequencing with the resulting reads averaging \u003e 25,000 base-pairs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8v12","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cmp3f","text":"References","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"741un","text":"Nishii K, Möller M, Hart M (2019) DNA extraction protocol for long read sequencing; DNA extraction for state-of-the-art sequencing. It is better not to apply more than 7 ml of lysate to a Genomic-tip 100/G column, since the lysate also contains contaminants and thus an excess amount of contaminants can result in poor DNA quality. Therefore, there are options, to either a) re-using the Genomic-tip column to process multiples of 5 ml lysate from the same sample, or b) use a separate Genomic-tip column for each subsample. For speed and cost savings we use a combination of the two options– two Genomic-tips per sample, reused twice.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e8khp","text":"Add 10 μl RNase A or 50 μl RNase A/T1 Mix to the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bc92b","text":"Gently swirl the tubes to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2p2uv","text":"Add 100 µl QIAGEN Proteinase K to the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11r6i","text":"Swirl the tubes to mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"707kd","text":"Incubate the tubes at 50 °C in the water bath, for \u003e 5 hours or overnight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5le28","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aec1g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"E8DCAE807D6F11EAB371C7D49F2DA0EC","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"50","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c12hv","text":"Assessing DNA integrity: Perform quality checks for DNA integrity by 0.8% agarose gel electrophoresis or Agilent Technologies TapeStation Genomic DNA ScreenTape.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bdos0","text":"Assessing DNA quality: Perform a DNA quality assessment for OD values with a spectrophotometer such as NanoDrop or DeNovix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cmp9e","text":"Assessing DNA quantity: For NGS applications, DNA quantity must be assessed using a fluorometer such as the Qubit or DeNovix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7dlfk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"89gpq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b0iv0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"874aj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2dpks","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9ugkm","text":"The DNA concentration values from spectrophotometer and fluorometer assays match in good quality DNA. If they are greatly differ, the DNA quality may be compromised.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e9ece","text":"Optional: The presence of residual RNA can be measured by Qubit RNA HS assay.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2bd4d","text":"Repeat the above steps 7 to 12 until all the leaf tissue is ground. The suspension should be smooth with no clumps of leaf material.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"pra3","text":"Prepare 60 ml Sorbitol buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1gj9e","text":"Prepare six 50 ml Falcon tubes on ice and place 100 μm gauge cell strainers (Nylon Meshes) on top.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fa935","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d5buh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"35919EF01DFD11ECAC492D4240382653","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3lghs","text":"Cut 1-2g of fresh leaf tissue from living plants and place in liquid nitrogen to shock-freeze.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"66oj","text":"Add frozen tissue to pre-cooled mortar held in a Styrofoam mortar holder.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d9ht9","text":"Add some liquid nitrogen and grind carefully with pestle as the liquid nitrogen evaporates. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"et5a9","text":"Once the liquid nitrogen has evaporated, grind more vigorously for 30 seconds, until the material is a fine powder.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kg2q","text":"Do not allow the tissue powder to thaw.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dr9sn","text":"Incubate the tubes at 50 °C for 5 minutes for RNase A, or 30 minutes for RNase A/T1 Mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"am2u3","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"70a23","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A161CD401E2411ECAC492D4240382653","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"50","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e5hqn","text":"To obtain the clear lysate, centrifuge the 50 ml Falcon tubes containing nuclei and cell lysate from step 28 at 3,000 × g for 10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":120,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2s0aj","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4s6o8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"3000","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E4824A901E2511ECAC492D4240382653","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"776i9","text":"Allow Buffer QF to flow through the column by gravity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e8j08","text":"Store the eluted DNA sample on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bvm4v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22opl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f497f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9hsbi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6lim0","text":"The Genomic-tip columns can be reused for the same sample. Simply repeat from step 31– step 34 with the used column. The columns are stable for up to six hours from first equilibration. Do not dry columns.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9nofd","text":"Leave the tubes at 50 °C, 300 rpm in a ThermoMixer for 1 hour.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"41soa","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"838u7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"486AC6E01E3511ECAC492D4240382653","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"50","unit":10}}}}
